name: Kangaroo Simulator VR
description:
Kangaroo Simulator VR (Demo) takes players on first-person adventures through the outback as a kangaroo while giving an intense lower body workout. Players may (#1) bounce on a yoga/pilates ball, (#2) hop up-and-down while standing, or even (#3) jog to move the character forward and through the story. Kangaroo Simulator VR has natural interaction, jumping/moving vertically to propel forward, so the uneasiness sometimes experienced with motion is limited. There are currently 2 stories (top green buttons) and a story-free mode (bottom green button). Movement will begin only after a green button is pressed.

This game should be playable on all high-end VR HMDs, including Oculus and HTC Vive. Each story lasts about 7 minutes. I hope it offers some entertainment, but it should be considered a demo. Donations will go towards expanding and improving the experience. So, please consider it.

Credits are as follows:

Murat Sahin Kilic - Jump Mechanic, UI Buttons (https://www.linkedin.com/in/asrakan/)

3D Models - Poly by Google

Music - Free Music Archivre (freemusicarchive.org, see list below)

Lance G Powell Jr. - Narrative Design, Concept Design, Level Design, Added Models, Added Scripting, Audio Assets, Vocal "Talent" (https://medium.com/@lancegpowelljr)
